devdoc.details: Locks funds, releases on confirmation, refunds on dispute

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC-20 token failed.

params._mneeToken: Address of the MNEE ERC20 token

returns._0: balance Amount of MNEE held in escrow

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: AgentEscrow

completeJob(bytes32,address).notice: Complete a job and release funds to provider

constructor.notice: Initialize escrow with MNEE token and timeout

createJob(uint256,uint256,address,uint25.notice: Create a new job and lock MNEE

disputeJob(bytes32).notice: Dispute a job and refund caller

expireJob(bytes32,address).notice: Expire a job and release to provider (after timeout)

getEscrowBalance().notice: Get current MNEE balance locked in escrow

setPlatformFeeBps(uint256).notice: Update platform fee in basis points (only owner)

userdoc.notice: Handles MNEE payment escrow for agent services
